original_text: If he dedicates to the Lord a field that he has bought, which is not a part of his possession,
korean_text: 만일 사람에게 샀고 자기 기업이 아닌 밭을 여호와께 성별하여 드렸으면

sentences.original_text: If he dedicates to the Lord a field
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그가 주께 밭을 구별하여 드리면

sentences.original_text: which is not a part of his possession
